page.title: 02Industry In South Bradford.
page.content: The traditional industries of{wool and {textiles}have declined dramatically in our area.Even{farming}in the southern half of the area is in decline and much of this land is in an overgrown and unused state.The old industries have been replaced by small companies involved in{light engineering}or{high} {technology}related to{computers}or the {aero-space.}One new industry has appeared because of the demolition of the old mills and back to back houses.{Stone dressing}and the resale of the stone is now one of the more obvious industries in our block.Much of this stone is used to build luxury houses all over the country.Bradford's new industrial estate is well situated,being next to the M606 but it has not attracted as many companies as expected and new factories are still being built in the city.
